entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 a.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy becoming mixed with drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower this afternoon. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast.
